content:
StatePersistence StatePersistence Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.dll

Indicates how actor state is stored for an actor service.

Edit

In this Article

public enum StatePersistencePublic Enum StatePersistence

Fields

None None

No state is stored for the actor.
Persisted Persisted

Actor state is persisted to local disk using a persistent state provider.
Volatile Volatile

Actor state is kept in-memory only using a volatile state provider.
